summary: This is an official notification letter from the Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York to two federal judges, informing them of the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein on August 10, 2019. It states Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell from an apparent suicide, was transported to a hospital, and was pronounced dead. It notes the FBI and DOJ Inspector General are investigating the incident.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the notification; died on August 10, 2019, in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center from an apparent suicide.

persons.name: Colleen McMahon
persons.context: One of the recipients of the notification letter from the Warden regarding Epstein's death.

persons.name: Richard M. Berman
persons.context: One of the recipients of the notification letter from the Warden regarding Epstein's death.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center around 6:30 a.m. from an apparent suicide. He was transported to a hospital and pronounced dead at 7:37 a.m.

events.title: Initiation of Investigations into Epstein's Death
events.description: The FBI began actively investigating the incident, and the Attorney General requested the DOJ Office of the Inspector General to also look into the matter.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, New York
Special Housing Unit, Metropolitan Correctional Center
New York Presbyterian-Lower Manhattan Hospital, New York, New York
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein died on the morning of August 10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
He was found unresponsive in his cell in the Special Housing Unit around 6:30 a.m. from an apparent suicide.
Epstein was pronounced dead at New York Presbyterian-Lower Manhattan Hospital at approximately 7:37 a.m.
The FBI and the DOJ Office of the Inspector General were both tasked with investigating the incident.
The official cause of death was pending an autopsy at the time of the notification.
